title: Arduino code: Read and write on separate I2C channels (same device)

cells.data:
Use the same code on every device.

Writes as master using `Wire`
Listens as slave using `Wire1`

## Simple case: Toggle LED

Sends instructions on `Wire` to turn on/off another deviceâ€™s LED, but also listens on `Wire1` for instructions to turn on/off its own LED.
